affordance_types.name: grasp
affordance_types.prompt: (Can a typical {} be grasped with one hand?)
affordance_types.description: The object can be grasped in any way

affordance_types.name: cut
affordance_types.prompt: (Can a typical {} be used to cut through objects and does it have a blade?)
affordance_types.description: The object can be used to cut other objects

affordance_types.name: scoop
affordance_types.prompt: (Can a typical {} be used to scoop material?)
affordance_types.description: The object can be used to scoop or shove material like powder or objects

affordance_types.name: contain
affordance_types.prompt: (Is a typical {} designed to put either objects or liquids inside of it?)
affordance_types.description: The object is designed to put either objects or liquids inside of it

affordance_types.name: pound
affordance_types.prompt: (Is a {} useful to pound some objects with. Do not answer yes if objects be pound on top of a {})
affordance_types.description: The object can be swung to pound other objects

affordance_types.name: support
affordance_types.prompt: (Does a typical {} provide good support for objects standing on it?)
affordance_types.description: The object provides good support for other objects standing on it

affordance_types.name: wrap-grasp
affordance_types.prompt: (Can a typical {} be grasped with one hand and is it possible to wrap ones hand around it or parts of it)
affordance_types.description: Its possible to wrap ones fingers around the object or parts of it
